languages.text: "Я не возлагал на твой вид больших надежд. Быть может, в чем-то я ошибался".

traits.locale_text: "Я не возлагал на твой вид больших надежд. Быть может, в чем-то я ошибался".

languages.text: "I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."
languages.original_text: "Я не возлагал на твой вид больших надежд. Быть может, в чем-то я ошибался".

traits.locale_text: "I have not been putting a lot of hope in your species. Perhaps, in some regards, less than I should have."
"I have not been putting a lot of hope in your species. Perhaps, in some regards, less than I should have."
"I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."
"I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."
"I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

languages.text: «En el pasado no he tenido en mucha estima a los de tu especie. Puede que me equivocase y haya honrosas excepciones».
languages.original_text: "I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: «En el pasado no he tenido en mucha estima a los de tu especie. Puede que me equivocase y haya honrosas excepciones».

languages.text: 「私はこれまでお前たちの種族をあまり評価してこなかった。おそらく、いくつかの点でそれは間違っていたのだろう」
languages.original_text: "I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこれまでお前たちの種族をあまり評価してこなかった。おそらく、いくつかの点でそれは間違っていたのだろう」

languages.text: “我以前有点看不起你们的种族，但或许，从某些方面而言，我这样的看法是错误的。”
languages.original_text: "I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: “我以前有点看不起你们的种族，但或许，从某些方面而言，我这样的看法是错误的。”

languages.text: « Je n'ai fait que peu de cas de votre espèce jusqu'à présent. Peut-être qu'à certains égards, c'était une erreur de ma part. »
languages.original_text: "I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai fait que peu de cas de votre espèce jusqu'à présent. Peut-être qu'à certains égards, c'était une erreur de ma part. »

languages.text: "Ich hielt früher nicht viel von Eurer Spezies. Vielleicht lag ich in mancher Hinsicht falsch."
languages.original_text: "I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hielt früher nicht viel von Eurer Spezies. Vielleicht lag ich in mancher Hinsicht falsch."

languages.text: "Geçmişte türüne neredeyse hiç saygı göstermezdim. Belki de bu konuda hatalı davranmışımdır."
languages.original_text: "I have set little store by your species in the past. Perhaps, in some regards, I was wrong to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmişte türüne neredeyse hiç saygı göstermezdim. Belki de bu konuda hatalı davranmışımdır."
